review_text: This lake house is very comfortable and has great amenities such as floats, yard games, a hammock under the trees. The lake is beautiful and there are several canoes, kayaks and a little John boat. The dock is large, private and covered which makes it the perfect place to catch that lake breeze on the dock swing. The front and back yard are fully fenced (my German Shepherd could jump the fence so if you have an escape artist…). There were no close neighbor dogs when we were there if you have a reactive pup. The kitchen is fully furnished with kitchenware, even a crockpot and air fryer. The outside grill is small so if you want to grill meat and sides for a family of four, you may need to cook in batches. The beds are super comfortable, the furniture in the den cozy. There is traffic noise from the road which is my only complaint but it’s not heard in the house. Our family spent a whole week there and rarely had to leave. It was our home away from home and we really enjoyed staying there.

The Lakehouse was clean and had a dehumidifier so there were absolutely no issues with air quality or odors. For those with allergies, like me, that is always a concern; but the place was free of any odors or mold or musty smells. Was just perfect.

My husband was recuperating from kidney stone surgery and so it was a great place to just relax with no stress. I was able to cook for us and watch TV and just chill which is what we both needed. And stores in town were not far and easy to get to.

The sunsets at the dock were breathtaking and so I took many amazing g photos. I had my 84 yr old mother with me and she thoroughly enjoyed herself and claimed the recliner in front of the TV as "her spot."

The wildlife was plentiful including a hawk on the fence the first morning watching the squirrels play. Thought he might have one for breakfast but he was just enjoying watching them run around the yard...they were great entertainment.

There were also blue herons and red crested sand hill cranes and fish jumping in Lake Letta.

I can't imagine anyone being disappointed.

Thank you for your hospitality, Rasmussen's. We'll DEFINITELY be back!!!!!

Tom & Rachael Streifel
